title: Pompeo calls for unity against Iran
text:
Pompeo calls for unity against Iran Sunday, April 29, 2018 - 01:04
ROUGH CUT (NO REPORTER NARRATION.) New U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo underscored the need for unity in the Gulf during a brief visit to the Saudi capital on Sunday as Washington aims to muster ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
